translation.en: Please restate the names of these two men.
translation.it: Identifichi di nuovo i due uomini.

translation.en: You brokered an arms deal between them?
translation.it: Ha negoziato la compravendita di armi?

translation.en: And you were in a relationship with both of them?
translation.it: E ha avuto una relazione con entrambi?

translation.en: Help me get the food chain right.
Hector Álvarez was supplying Adrian Lovell with weapons.
translation.it: Hector Álvarez riforniva Adrian Lovell di armi.

translation.en: Lady, stop telling us our jobs. We can take you in if you want.
translation.it: Non ci dica come fare il nostro lavoro. Preferisce finire in cella?

translation.en: -You don't know how bad this gets. -[FBI Agent 1] Then tell us.
translation.it: - Non sapete quanto rischiamo. - Ce lo dica lei.

translation.en: Look, I get that this is dark,
so why don't we start with the weapons Álvarez is supplying?
translation.it: Perché non iniziamo dalle armi che traffica Álvarez?

translation.en: They want you dead for what you know, right?
translation.it: La vogliono morta per quello che sa.

translation.en: We need to talk about my deal.
I'm sick of the bridge tournament this bitch is playing.
translation.it: Questa non è una partita di bridge, stronza.

translation.en: You wouldn't know the first thing about protecting me.
translation.it: Non sapreste neanche da dove cominciare.

translation.en: [FBI Agent 2] Álvarez is in Cuba, Lovell's under surveillance.
translation.it: Álvarez è a Cuba e Lovell è sotto sorveglianza.

translation.en: We've had a tail on him since the second he landed at O'Hare.
translation.it: Lo stiamo seguendo da quando è atterrato all'O'Hare.

translation.en: -Then he knows where we are. -[chuckles softly] Let me tell you--
You think you're following him? He's following you.
translation.it: - Ascoltami bene… - Credete di seguirlo? È lui a seguire voi.

translation.en: If you think you're gonna dictate how we conduct an interrogation, -I don't know who you-- -[silenced gunshot]
translation.it: Se pensi di poter controllare il tuo interrogatorio, non so chi credi…

translation.en: Are we breached? Do you copy?
Did you think you could hide from me?
translation.it: Credevi di poterti nascondere da me?

translation.en: You must have known I'd find you.
-Where's my baby? -She's in the nursery. She was very fortunate.
translation.it: - Dov'è mia figlia? - Nella nursery. È stata molto fortunata.

translation.en: Well, what you want is no longer the deciding factor in what happens next.
translation.it: Non sei più tu a determinare quello che accadrà d'ora in poi.

translation.en: You wasted 12 hours of FBI time trying to cut a deal for yourself
translation.it: Hai fatto perdere 12 ore all'FBI per ottenere un accordo

translation.en: This conversation now takes place on our terms.
translation.it: Quindi ora saremo noi a decidere.

translation.en: You can't keep her from me. I'm her mother.
translation.it: Non potete portarmela via. Sono sua madre.

translation.en: What you are to that child right now is a death sentence.
translation.it: In questo momento, sei la sua condanna a morte.

translation.en: Adrian Lovell and Hector Álvarez represent ruthless business interests.
translation.it: Adrian Lovell e Hector Álvarez rappresentano interessi senza scrupoli.

translation.en: If you leave here with that child, they will kill her.
translation.it: Se scappi con la bambina, la uccideranno.

translation.en: Lovell already stabbed a pregnant belly.
translation.it: Lovell ha già pugnalato una donna incinta.

translation.en: What would he do to a live child? Adrian Lovell is dead.
translation.it: - Cosa farebbe a una neonata? - Adrian Lovell è morto.

translation.en: Lovell was extracted from the house fire before backup arrived.
translation.it: È stato prelevato dall'incendio prima dell'arrivo dei rinforzi.

translation.en: His body was never accounted for. [sighs]
translation.it: Il corpo non è stato ritrovato.

translation.en: Your daughter will be placed in witness security…
translation.it: Tua figlia entrerà nella protezione testimoni…

translation.en: My daughter is not going into the foster system.
…so no one knows who her mother is.
translation.it: …e nessuno saprà chi è sua madre.

translation.en: You underestimate my ability to protect my child.
translation.it: Sono perfettamente in grado di proteggerla.

translation.en: Back-to-back tours in Iraq and Afghanistan,
translation.it: Mandati continui in Iraq e Afghanistan,

translation.en: 46 confirmed kills, accurate to 1,300 meters with an M24.
translation.it: 46 uccisioni confermate, colpisci bersagli a 1.300 metri con l'M24.

translation.en: Tell me how that helps her.
You and I both know the only way you protect that child is to disappear.
translation.it: Sai anche tu che l'unico modo per proteggerla è sparire.

translation.en: They'll find you. Both of you.
the FBI has a terrible record of protecting the whereabouts of people
translation.it: l'FBI tende a lasciarsi sfuggire la posizione di persone

translation.en: who caused the death of federal agents.
translation.it: che hanno causato la morte di agenti federali.

translation.en: Termination of parental rights. Sign when you're ready.
translation.it: Cessazione della potestà genitoriale. Firma quando sei pronta.

translation.en: One, you put her with good people.
translation.it: Uno, affidala a delle brave persone.

translation.en: I want her to have the most boring, stable life there is.
translation.it: Voglio che abbia la vita più noiosa e stabile possibile.

translation.en: Two, you let me know she's safe,
translation.it: Due, fammi sapere che è al sicuro.

translation.en: Don't sneak up on somebody with PTS--
translation.it: Meglio annunciarsi a chi soffre di PTS…

translation.en: Well, now I'm really fucking triggered.
translation.it: Cazzo, questo sì che è un trigger.

translation.en: Some of the ranchers would pay good money for shooters like you.
translation.it: Gli allevatori pagherebbero oro per una cecchina come te.

translation.en: -If you want-- -I don't want anything, Jons.
translation.it: - Se vuoi… - Non voglio niente, Jons.

translation.en: Hey. We're all lost when we get out.
translation.it: Ehi. Tutti ci sentiamo persi quando torniamo alla vita civile.

translation.en: Whatever you've done, you're still here. Still time to make it right.
translation.it: Qualunque cosa tu abbia fatto, sei ancora qui. Puoi rimediare.

translation.en: Anybody sees us in town, you don't know me.
translation.it: In città, fingi di non conoscermi.

translation.en: Let's see how big she got.
Civilization is built on the little things.
translation.it: I piccoli gesti ci rendono civili.

translation.en: Tell me what's going on, Cruise.
ATF busted some of Hector Álvarez's men at a stash house in Nuevo Laredo.
translation.it: L'ATF ha beccato alcuni uomini di Álvarez in un nascondiglio a Nuevo Laredo.

translation.en: Typical stuff. MK12s, you know, bump stocks, silencers.
translation.it: Solita roba. MK12, bump stock, silenziatori.

translation.en: The six men are in custody in Mexico.
translation.it: I sei uomini sono in custodia in Messico.

translation.en: You didn't bring me here for a lineup.
translation.it: Non mi hai portata qui per questo.

translation.en: -I will protect her. -Can't advise you on that.
translation.it: - La proteggerò. - Non posso darti consigli.

translation.en: You can tell me her name now.
You knew this was coming. You should've had people.
I couldn't know how or when. I couldn't know what Hector was--
translation.it: Non potevo sapere come o quando, né quello che Hector…

translation.en: And you couldn't set up a standard perimeter?
translation.it: Non potevi allestire un cazzo di perimetro?

translation.en: Obviously that was beyond what I expected. That was Hector's top lieutenants.
translation.it: Chiaramente non mi aspettavo gli uomini migliori di Hector.

translation.en: Yes, Yanil Gonzalez, the one who grabbed her.
translation.it: Yanil Gonzalez, quello che l'ha rapita.

translation.en: There's a change of clothes next to you.
translation.it: C'è un cambio d'abiti accanto a te.

translation.en: I kept them all and did what I could to keep her a secret.
translation.it: Le ho mantenute e ho cercato di tenerla nascosta.

translation.en: Whose clothes are these, some desk cop?
translation.it: Sono di una tua collega burocrate?

translation.en: We have a team setting up at the house. We'll wait for a ransom call.
translation.it: Abbiamo un team a casa di Zoe. Aspettiamo che chiamino per il riscatto.

translation.en: -There won't be any call. -What do they want?
They can have a nice, long look at me while I kill every last one of them.
translation.it: Che mi guardino bene e a lungo mentre li uccido dal primo all'ultimo.

translation.en: Then I get the kid back to her parents.
translation.it: Riporto la bambina ai suoi genitori.
Posto perfetto per la luna di miele.

translation.en: -[in Spanish] Throw away the gun. -Calm down.
Count those tiles. He's a cheater.
translation.it: Conta le tessere. È un imbroglione.

translation.en: -Shut up, old woman! -I won't shut up!
Get the hell out of my house!
[in English] Put him in the trunk.
[in English] I'm asking the fucking questions!
translation.it: Faccio io le cazzo di domande!

translation.en: -[in Spanish] Where's the girl? -[Cruise] I don't think he knows.
translation.it: - Dov'è la bambina? - Non credo lo sappia.

translation.en: -[in Spanish] What'd he say? -[in English] Want me to tell?
translation.it: - Che ha detto? - Vuoi sapere che ha detto?

translation.en: So this is how you interrogate.
translation.it: Quindi è questo il tuo metodo.

translation.en: [Mother] Hector wants me there, right? But I'm not going in blind. [breathes heavily]
translation.it: Hector mi vuole lì, giusto? Ma non ci andrò alla cieca.

translation.en: [in English] You learn things in the service.
The bubbles sting like hell, right? Now…
translation.it: Le bolle bruciano da morire, eh? Ora…

translation.en: All of them. [in English] It's a trap.
As long as we get Zoe, they can have me.
translation.it: Riprendiamoci Zoe e potranno avere me.

translation.en: And the things he's gonna do to her,
translation.it: E le cose che le farà,

translation.en: So, you're not just barbed wire around a fist.
translation.it: Non sei solo un pugno col filo spinato.

translation.en: I'm whatever I need to be to keep her safe.
translation.it: Sono chi devo essere per tenerla al sicuro.

translation.en: Including turning yourself into a ghost.
translation.it: Tipo il fantasma in cui ti sei trasformata?

translation.en: You could've let me die, but you didn't.
It's like you knew I was thirsty all the time.
translation.it: Era come se sapessi che avevo sempre sete.

translation.en: You were taking care of me and my baby.
translation.it: Ti sei preso cura di me e di mia figlia.

translation.en: Felt like a man worth saving.
How'd you get involved in all this shit?
translation.it: Come sei finita in questa storia?

translation.en: I want those targets on fire!
[Mother] Lovell was ex-SAS, training my sniper unit.
translation.it: Lovell era un ex SAS e addestrava la mia unità di cecchini.

translation.en: The trick is to perform when suffering.
translation.it: Dovete fare centro anche se soffrite.

translation.en: 500 meters, even your heartbeat will throw you off target.
translation.it: A 500 metri di distanza, basta un battito per sbagliare.

translation.en: All it creates is chaos, suffering, and people who need things.
translation.it: Crea solo caos, sofferenza e persone con dei bisogni.

translation.en: I'm just a man who can get those things.
translation.it: Sono solo un uomo che può soddisfarli.

translation.en: For whose side? A three-star general, an Uzbek warlord…
translation.it: - Chi servi? - Generali, signori della guerra uzbechi…

translation.en: Powerful people want things… that aren't on the menu.
translation.it: I potenti vogliono cose… che non sono sul menù.

translation.en: I should've run the other direction.
translation.it: Sarei dovuta scappare nella direzione opposta.

translation.en: What else was I gonna do after the service?
translation.it: Che altro avrei potuto fare dopo l'esercito?

translation.en: and the best that I could hope for was being a cashier at a retail chain.
translation.it: e mi sarei dovuta accontentare di fare la commessa in un negozio.

translation.en: [Mother] Adrian was offering more than that.
translation.it: Adrian mi stava offrendo di più.

translation.en: Did a tour in Guantanamo instead.
[Mother] I wasn't gonna be his employee.
translation.it: Non volevo essere una sua sottoposta.

translation.en: I waited until I had something to bring to the table.
translation.it: Aspettai di avere qualcosa da offrirgli.

translation.en: Eighteen months in a guard tower tends to sharpen the focus.
translation.it: Diciotto mesi in una torre di guardia ti fanno notare molte cose.

translation.en: [Mother] Hector was siphoning guns off the base under everyone's noses.
translation.it: Hector sottraeva armi dalla base sotto il naso di tutti.

translation.en: -I saw him for what he was. -And what was that?

translation.it: Le armi di Hector. Le conoscenze di Adrian.

translation.en: My problem is I've got an entire armory of Hector's stolen munitions in that harbor,
translation.it: Il mio problema è che ho un arsenale di munizioni rubate da Hector nel porto

translation.en: and I gotta make sure those weapons find a good home.
translation.it: e devo assicurarmi che quelle armi trovino una casa.

translation.en: I've got the perfect home, but your repartero boyfriend
translation.it: Io ho la casa perfetta, ma il tuo caro repartero

translation.en: is trying to raise the price you and I agreed on.
translation.it: sta cercando di alzare il prezzo che avevamo concordato.

translation.en: Somebody's been studying their Cuban slang.
translation.it: Qualcuno ha studiato lo slang cubano.

translation.en: I've been taking orders my whole life.
translation.it: Prendevo ordini da tutta la vita.

translation.en: And it felt good to be in control.
I bet you he's a better dancer than you are.
translation.it: Scommetto che è un ballerino migliore di te.

translation.en: There's more money than we thought. I did good.
translation.it: Otterremo più soldi. Sono stato bravo.

translation.en: [Álvarez] This dude has very powerful friends, like you said,
translation.it: Lui ha amici potenti, come dicevi tu,

translation.en: so sometimes they want things that are not on the menu.
translation.it: e a volte vogliono cose che non sono sul menù.

translation.en: I had to find out for myself.
If you don't mind me asking.
I see them. Another two out front. Hector's moving up in the world.
translation.it: Li vedo. Altri due davanti. Hector si è fatto una posizione.

translation.en: No. Adrian handed him this place and he let it rot on the vine.
translation.it: No. Adrian gli ha dato questo posto e lui l'ha mandato in malora.
Lei è lì da qualche parte.

translation.en: I've got eyes on her. Get in position.
Give me your hand. Come on.
I got her. We're on our way.
Shh, you stay right here. You stay right by my side.
Heading to you in ten seconds.
translation.it: Siamo da te tra dieci secondi.

translation.en: It's okay. It's all right. Hey.
translation.it: Sta' tranquilla. È tutto a posto. Ehi.

translation.en: Let me look at you. Okay?
[in English] Throw it out of the window.
[in English] You sold your soul to the devil. How come you still look so good?
translation.it: Hai venduto l'anima al diavolo. Come fai a essere ancora così bella?

translation.en: Why get that little girl involved?
You're not getting away this time.
You need a dozen people to guard you while you sleep.
translation.it: Hai dieci persone a proteggerti mentre dormi.

translation.en: They're all gone, by the way.
Well, then they died for a good cause…
translation.it: Allora sono morte per una buona causa.

translation.en: Actually, my dick gets hard thinking about this.
translation.it: Il cazzo mi si drizza, se ci penso.

translation.en: You should've thought about that more back in the day.
Coño. You're gonna go that low?
No. No, what matters is that you sold me out.
translation.it: Quello che ha importanza è che mi hai venduto.

translation.en: That you shit on everything we built.
translation.it: Hai distrutto ciò che avevamo costruito.

translation.en: Are you going to pay me back now?
Do you remember the games we used to play?
We can do it for real.
I'm gonna watch you die like an animal.
translation.it: Ti guarderò morire come un animale.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you real turned on. Then I'm going to split you in half.
translation.it: Ti farò eccitare come mai prima. Poi ti taglierò in due.

translation.en: Do you remember the safe word?
We never had a safe word.
translation.it: Non ne abbiamo mai avuta una.

translation.en: [in English] Please do not leave baggage unattended.
translation.it: Si prega di non lasciare i bagagli incustoditi.

translation.en: So, I think she's bouncing back. Talked to her mother.
translation.it: Credo che si stia riprendendo. Ho parlato con la madre.

translation.en: Pancakes will be on the table when we arrive.
translation.it: Ci saranno i pancake ad aspettarci.

translation.en: Thank the FBI. Cruise got it for you.
translation.it: Ringrazia l'FBI. Te l'ha preso Cruise.

translation.en: services and counseling and people to talk to.
translation.it: servizi, psicologi e persone con cui parlare.

translation.en: Cruise will be out soon. You should wait in the car.
translation.it: Cruise uscirà presto. Aspettalo in macchina.

translation.en: [Cruise] So that's it? You're just gonna vanish again, huh?
She's 12. Just let her go be a kid.
translation.it: Ha 12 anni. Lasciale fare la bambina.

translation.en: Let this all just be a bad memory.
translation.it: Che questo sia solo un brutto ricordo.

translation.en: We got about six more hours, so if you wanna take a nap, be my guest.
translation.it: Ci vorranno sei ore da qui. Se vuoi dormire un po', fa' pure.

translation.en: Why won't she just admit it?
translation.it: Perché non lo ammette e basta?

translation.en: Zoe, let's just get you back to your real family, okay?
translation.it: Zoe, torniamo dalla tua vera famiglia, ok?

translation.en: [doctor, in Spanish] Look, here is the head.
Tonight, you get to sleep in your own bed.
[Cruise] Yeah. You and your BFF still getting along?
translation.it: Sì. Vai ancora d'accordo con la tua amichetta del cuore?

translation.en: -[Zoe] BFF? -[Cruise] Ain't that what you call it?
Look at the mess you made.
Someone from child welfare? Social Services?
translation.it: Si occupa di minori? Un assistente sociale?

translation.en: Not with that standard FBI holster.
translation.it: Non con la fondina d'ordinanza dell'FBI.

translation.en: Look, you saw what was out there.
translation.it: Hai visto con chi abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: The feds can protect your parents, but they can't protect us. Nobody can.
translation.it: L'FBI può proteggere i tuoi, ma non noi. Nessuno può farlo.

translation.en: So we just keep moving and cover our tracks.
translation.it: Continueremo a muoverci senza farci seguire.

translation.en: Well, what do they want from me?
You're a chip, something to bargain with.
I can't explain it to you at your age.
translation.it: Non posso spiegartelo alla tua età.

translation.en: You're a kid. It'll scare you.
I forgot, I… This is for you.
-Hello? -I called to tell you that she's safe.
translation.it: - Pronto? - Volevo dirti che è al sicuro.

translation.en: -Let me talk to her, please. -She can't.
-What did you say? -She can't come back to her life yet.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Non può tornare alla sua vita.

translation.en: I don't understand any of this, so explain to me what that means.
translation.it: Non capisco niente, quindi spiegami cosa significa.

translation.en: -You'll have to trust me. -Are you serious?
No, he promised me you would never come back.
translation.it: No, lui aveva promesso che non saresti tornata.

translation.en: I'm talking about Agent Cruise. They told me what happened.
translation.it: L'agente Cruise. Mi hanno detto quello che è successo.

translation.en: Hey, I need a minute. Need a minute. I can't--
translation.it: Mi serve un minuto. Non posso…

translation.en: I will get her back to her home. Okay? Back to you.
translation.it: La porterò a casa, va bene? Da te.

translation.en: Guess that's not a date I can put in my calendar.
translation.it: Non puoi darmi una data, immagino.
Il suo compleanno è a ottobre.

translation.en: Look, Cruise kept his promises, I keep mine.
translation.it: Cruise era una persona di parola e anch'io lo sono.

translation.en: You'll see her blow out another candle.

translation.it: - Sali. - No. Dov'è il mio cellulare?

translation.en: You need to get in the truck.
A nice-looking young lady you got.
If you were here a while, you could take a look at the salmon run.
translation.it: Avreste potuto vedere la risalita dei salmoni.

translation.en: It's just fish swimming upstream, laying their eggs to die.
translation.it: Nuotano controcorrente per deporre le uova e morire.

translation.en: Not very romantic, looking at it that way.
translation.it: Non è molto romantico, visto così.

translation.en: You must be doing some hunting.
You might wanna stock up too.
translation.it: Meglio se fa scorta anche lei.

translation.en: What is it, Halloween? Put those back.
Why are you pretending you don't know each other?
Strangers don't talk like that. It was like…
translation.it: Gli estranei non parlano così. Sembravate…

translation.en: spies or something, talking in code.
The deer has to hang for the meat to tenderize.
translation.it: Il cervo va appeso per fare ammorbidire la carne.

translation.en: so it would be Bambi's dad.
translation.it: quindi sarebbe stato il papà di Bambi.

translation.en: that rabbit had a better life than any cheeseburger you ever ate.
translation.it: Ha avuto una vita migliore dei cheeseburger che mangi tu.

translation.en: He had a beautiful life until you shot him.
Let me tell you something, kid.
There's nothing you ever ate that didn't come from violence.
translation.it: Nessun alimento è prodotto senza violenza.

translation.en: Half of Paraguay was burned and deforested for soy plantations.
translation.it: Hanno bruciato e deforestato mezzo Paraguay per la soia.

translation.en: Those cows are impregnated just so they can be pulled on all day.
translation.it: Ingravidano le mucche per mungerle tutto il giorno.

translation.en: I know a mercenary in the Ivory Coast, said they fought a civil war
translation.it: Un mercenario ivoriano diceva di aver combattuto una guerra civile

translation.en: Meet me outside in five minutes.
But not till you know how to survive, everything it takes.
translation.it: Ma devi imparare a sopravvivere a ogni costo.

translation.en: And this is where we start.
'Cause you're gonna work harder than you ever thought you could.
translation.it: Perché lavorerai più duramente di quanto immagini.

translation.en: Then you'll run out your reserve tank and find you had more,
translation.it: Finirai le energie, scoprirai di averne ancora

translation.en: and you'll run that out too.
But when it's done, you're gonna drive outta here yourself.
translation.it: Ma alla fine te ne andrai da qui al volante di quell'auto.

translation.en: Put the key in the ignition.
Yeah. Turn it over. Turn it.

translation.it: In avanti e verso il basso. Pronta? Vai.

translation.en: Get your rifle up. You don't get to catch your breath.
We do this so you can think when you're exhausted.
translation.it: In questo modo puoi pensare quando sei stanca.

translation.en: Do you wanna come play? Of course you do.
They're not pets. Nothing out here is.
translation.it: Non sono animali da compagnia. Qui non esistono.

translation.en: No. No, look. The green ones are just salt shells.
translation.it: No, guarda. Quelle verdi sono cartucce a sale.

translation.en: Just good for scaring something off.
Don't ever put that in your mouth again. It's not for you. You don't do that.
translation.it: Non ti azzardare mai più. Non fa per te. Non farlo.

translation.en: You're not me. You hear me?
translation.it: Tu non sei come me, chiaro?

translation.en: -You're not me. -I don't wanna be you.
translation.it: - Non sei come me. - Non voglio esserlo.

translation.en: No. I'm leaving. You're not stopping me.
translation.it: No. Me ne vado. E tu non mi fermerai.

translation.en: Why are you such a bitch?
Don't you call me a bitch! Don't you ever call me a bitch!
translation.it: Non chiamarmi stronza! Non farlo mai più!

translation.en: Keeping you safe doesn't make me a bitch.
translation.it: Proteggerti non fa di me una stronza.

translation.en: -Lying to me does. -How am I lying?
That's not lying. That's just not talking about things that don't matter.
translation.it: Quello non è mentire. È non parlare di cose senza importanza.

translation.en: Besides, you already have a good mom.
translation.it: E poi hai già una brava mamma.

translation.en: I miss her and my dad, and I'm not allowed to talk to you about anything
translation.it: Mi mancano lei e papà, e non mi è permesso parlarti di niente

translation.en: if it's not how to gut a fish or how to field dress a duck!
translation.it: che non sia come eviscerare un pesce o sventrare un'anatra!

translation.en: Field dress a duck? I can't talk to you.
translation.it: - Sventrare un'anatra? - Non posso parlare con te.

translation.en: There's things in this world you don't need to know yet.
translation.it: Ci sono cose che non sei pronta a sapere.

translation.en: Whatever the question, that's your answer.
translation.it: Qualunque sia la domanda… ecco la tua risposta.

translation.en: And it's the only one I got.
You have to practice, get the timing right.
translation.it: Devi fare pratica, scegliere il momento giusto.

translation.en: If you grip too soon, you cut yourself.
translation.it: Se stringi troppo presto, ti tagli.

translation.en: A knife fight means your enemy's close.
translation.it: Usi il coltello se il nemico è vicino.

translation.en: You can't hit him just once.
translation.it: Non puoi colpirlo una volta sola.

translation.en: You can never stop hitting him until he can't hit back.
translation.it: Devi continuare finché lui non può più farti niente.

translation.en: You just keep hitting him again and again and again, just…
translation.it: Continui a colpirlo ancora e ancora…

translation.en: Every time I look at you, I'm scared.
translation.it: Io ho paura quando ti guardo.

translation.en: Well, it's the only way to survive.
-I never got a chance to find out. -But maybe?
translation.it: - Non ho avuto l'occasione di scoprirlo. - Ma, forse?

translation.en: You hear me? Remember where they are.
It's nature. You can't change it.
translation.it: È la natura. Non puoi cambiarla.

translation.en: But her cubs aren't old enough to hunt on their own.
translation.it: Ma i cuccioli non possono cacciare da soli.

translation.en: Well, if she dies, they'll have to learn.
You can't change it either way.
[Zoe] Do it again. Good boy! That's a good boy.
Here. You guys want some food?
You guys want some food? I have some food.
Oh, yeah. Let's get you stitched up. We'll get started on her. You're her mother?
translation.it: Sì. Ti mettiamo qualche punto. Ci pensiamo noi. Lei è la madre?

translation.en: There's some paperwork on the counter. Come on. This way, sweetie.
translation.it: Ci sono dei moduli sul bancone. Vieni. Di qua, tesoro.

translation.en: It's not too bad. Only took eight stitches.
translation.it: Non è grave. Ci sono voluti solo otto punti.

translation.en: I'm gonna send the nurse in with some aftercare instructions.
translation.it: L'infermiera le dirà come proseguire le cure.

translation.en: Zoe here is a brave girl.
[Zoe] I didn't know I wasn't supposed to tell him my real name.
translation.it: Non sapevo di non poter usare il mio vero nome.

translation.en: [Mother] No, I should have told you.
She gave her name. They put it in the computer.
translation.it: Le ha dato il suo nome. È nel computer.

translation.en: I can't risk it. You have to take her.
translation.it: Non posso rischiare. Devi prenderla tu.

translation.en: Just give her this when it's all over.
translation.it: Dalle questa quando sarà tutto finito.

translation.en: -[Mother on phone] How many? -[Jons] It's a full platoon.
She won't be safe till they're all gone. Do you see him?
translation.it: Sarà al sicuro quando moriranno tutti. Lui è con loro?

translation.en: Not sure. I'll take Zoe and go.
translation.it: Non lo so. Prendo Zoe e me ne vado.

translation.en: Well, tell her that I said I'm sorry that I lied about you and me.
translation.it: Dille che mi dispiace… - di aver mentito su noi due. - Su cosa?
- di aver mentito su noi due. - Su cosa?

translation.en: We're taking a trip back to the lower 48.
translation.it: Faremo un viaggio nei 48 a sud.

translation.en: Don't talk in code to me too.
translation.it: Non parlare in codice anche tu.

translation.en: I don't know. And that's the truth.
translation.it: Non lo so. Ed è la verità.

translation.en: We run until we get the word.
We served together, a long time ago.
I'm not much good in a fight anymore, though.
translation.it: Non sono più utile in combattimento.

translation.en: And even if I was, I suspect she'd still want me right here,
translation.it: Anche se lo fossi, penso che lei mi vorrebbe qui,

translation.en: She won't even admit she's my mother.
translation.it: Non ammette neanche di essere mia madre.

translation.en: you gotta pay attention to what she does, not what she says.
translation.it: devi fare attenzione a quello che fa, non a quello che dice.

translation.en: And all she lives for is you.
translation.it: E lei vive solo per te.

translation.en: When I left you in the hospital, it was not the end of me caring about you.
translation.it: quando ti ho lasciata in ospedale, non ho smesso di prendermi cura di te.

translation.en: Every decision I've made has been for you.
translation.it: Ogni decisione che ho preso, l'ho presa per te.

translation.en: The only thing that gave me any peace was knowing you were safe.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che mi dava pace era sapere che eri al sicuro.

translation.en: I'm a killer. You know that now.
But I'm also a mother, and I will die protecting you.
translation.it: Ma sono anche una madre e morirò proteggendoti.

translation.en: you are the one good and beautiful thing that I have done with my life.
translation.it: ma tu sei l'unica cosa buona e bella che abbia fatto nella vita.

translation.en: Someone tried to kill you before you were born,
translation.it: Qualcuno ha provato a ucciderti prima che nascessi,

translation.en: and you didn't just live, you flourished.
translation.it: e non solo sei scampata alla morte, ma hai prosperato.

translation.en: When you look in the mirror, remember it's a sign that you survived.
translation.it: Quando ti guardi allo specchio, ricordati che sei una sopravvissuta.

translation.en: That you would not let anyone or anything erase you.
translation.it: Che non hai permesso a niente e a nessuno di cancellarti.

translation.en: I have shown you my love in the only way I know how.
translation.it: Ti ho mostrato il mio amore nell'unico modo che conosco.

translation.en: When the time comes for you to use what I've taught you,
translation.it: Quando dovrai mettere in pratica i miei insegnamenti,

translation.en: don't hesitate to take your place in this world.
translation.it: non esitare a prenderti il tuo posto nel mondo.

translation.en: -[radio static crackles] -This is the kill zone.
Treat this as you would Basra, Brega,
translation.it: Contate di essere a Bassora, a Brega

translation.en: Treat her as you would a hundred snipers.
I'm the one who kills her.
Proceed with caution. I repeat, proceed with caution.
translation.it: Procedere con cautela. Ripeto, procedere con cautela.

translation.en: Time to send her a message.
translation.it: È ora di mandarle un messaggio.

translation.en: -Check for the girl's remains. -[radio static crackles]
[man 2 on radio] I see a little girl driving a truck, south road.
translation.it: Vedo una ragazzina su un pick-up. Arriva da sud.

translation.en: Converge on the south road. Get me the girl.
You can track. I pull the trigger.
translation.it: Tu individuali. Io premo il grilletto.

translation.en: [Zoe] I see one. He's on foot.
translation.it: Ne vedo uno. È a piedi.

translation.en: Hold left side of his head.
Meet me two clicks to the left of your position
translation.it: Incontriamoci a due chilometri a ovest,

translation.en: or I destroy that potential right now.
translation.it: o tutto quel talento andrà sprecato.

translation.en: It'll take me two minutes to get down there.
translation.it: Ci metterò due minuti a scendere.

translation.en: No matter what. You hear me?
These have been the best months of my life with you.
translation.it: Sono stati i mesi migliori della mia vita.

translation.en: Drop your weapons over the side.
The camouflage, too. All of it.
You have the shot, take it!
You burned down our entire world…
translation.it: Hai distrutto il nostro intero mondo…

translation.en: She's just up there, isn't she?
Bullet in your head will take us both out.
translation.it: Se ti sparasse in testa, moriremmo entrambi.

translation.en: Did you teach her to be ruthless? Hmm?
translation.it: Le hai insegnato a essere spietata?

translation.en: Can she stop her heart like you?
translation.it: Sa fermare i propri battiti come te?

translation.en: take a breath and tell her.
Come on, please. Please come on.
[sobbing] Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please!
Oh, my gosh, did you get taller?
translation.it: Oddio, ti sei fatta più alta?

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, it's hard on the man ♪
